Name: Laedomanes
About the game: Laedomanes is a First Person Platformer with elements of Parkour. Take on the role of a space explorer in search of Laedomanes, rare and valuable elements crafted by a long lost Ancient Civilization. The Civilization is lost to time but what have survived for an eternity are the Space Monoliths they built around artificial stars as part of their lost tradition and technology. Scattered throughout the galaxy, now these artificial stars serve no purpose other than being a potential reservoir of Laedomanes. Many are attracted to these Space Monoliths orbiting the artificial stars for their potential reward, but alongside the Laedomanes what else come are the sentient Machines that guard these Monoliths as though they are still serving their long lost creators. The game contains a short Campaign mode and Travel mode. Completing the Campaign mode unlocks the Travel mode, which allows you to use the Wormhole to travel to random artificial stars with procedurally generated levels. The Laedomanes collected can be used to improve your equipment. There is also a Hard difficulty option for those who want a tougher challenge.
